feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Cloud Applications Studio
feed.subtitle: SAP Cloud Applications Studio Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Custom Print Form is not Displaying the Changes from Adobe LiveCycle
entry.content:
Hello SAP,

I created a Print Form for my Custom Business Object and a Preview button to display the PDF.

The Preview button and displaying the PDF works well. Initially, my canvas is blank because I haven't made any changes in the .xdp file using Adobe LiveCycle.

I opened the .xdp file in the SDK to update the Form in Adobe LiveCycle.

Then, I saved my changes in Adobe LiveCycle, Activate Print Form, Check-in, and Deploy Business Configuration in SDK.

But when I checked in Form Template Maintenance the Form is still blank and the changes made in Adobe LiveCycle did not reflect.

When I open the .xdp file in Adobe LiveCycle the changes is there but the Form in ByD is not updated.

entry.title: Create Email Activity from Cloud Application Studio with rich text and embedded images
entry.content:
Hi,

I have a requirement on SAP Business ByDesign to output Email Activites with rich text (html) and embedded images.

We have accomplished the html part (following this guide: https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blog-posts-by-members/html-custom-email-notifications-in-sap-cloud-applications-studio/ba-p/13084626).

To handle images, I expect we need to add the images as attachments (this is easy and then they go out as part of the multipart message and become attachments to the email) but how do I link it up so an image shows in the body text (i.e. referenced in the html) rather than as an attachment?

Thanks in advance!

//Carl

entry.title: Output window shows no information in Visual Studio Extension - release 2505
entry.content:
Hello community,
Since the last update, we started using the visual studio extension for sap cloud application studio 2505.
However when we start debugging the output window doesn't show any system messages like warnings, errors etc.
In the standalone SAP Cloud Application studio the output window showed system messages.
Does anyone has the same problem and is there a solution?

entry.title: Is it possible to use OVS in a Modal Dialog?
entry.content:
Hi community.

I am working on a solution where i have an OWL and a button;

On the click of a button i need to show a modal dialog.

In the modal dialog i have a field called employee id which is of type ObjectValueSelector;

For the OVS i use public OVS EmployeeID

When i select an employee from the OVS options , the field is not populated with data from the selected employee.

I tried to use other public OVSs but the selected value from the OVS is not populated into the field.

Tried with different field types and OVS components but the result is the same.

Is there a limitation in UI Designer that we can't use an OVS inside a Modal Dialog?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP C4C SDK 2505: New Visual Studio 2022 based Setup
entry.content:
Hi Guys,

Has anyone successfully installed ^ worked the new Visual Studio 2022 based SAP Cloud Application Studio setup on a Intel machine?

I have installed "Visual Studio 2022" Enterprise Edition and then SDK extension from me.sap.com.

Now when I create a new project then I am able ot get the pop up to enter my credentials(FYI...You will get an error at this step if you use free community edition).

However, after entering the credentials, i get an error "Value Cannot be NULL" exception in Visual Studio.

I have followed all the instructions as in https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_CLOUD_APPLICATIONS_STUDIO/cbcebe3cfb1647a8b0322c18dbb0b481/d5278bebf61f4018b7468d669ea3a231.html?locale=en-US

Any help/input is really appriciated!!!

Thanks

Saurabh

entry.title: SAP Cloud Application Studio Deployment Failed in Production
entry.content: I attempted to activate my solution in the Implementation Manager; however, I consistently receive a "Deployment Failed" message. My internet connection is stable, and the deployment to the test tenant was successful. Unfortunately, I am unable to deploy it to the production tenant.

entry.title: PO Goods Receipt Exception Task Automation in SAP ByDesignPO Goods Receipt Exception Task Automat
entry.content: Hi i try to extend an BO and make some pdi developments via sdk app i try to create a .xbo for the trigger of Inbound Logistics - Purchase Orders post good receit on save Find the trigger for receiving a purchase order to the warehouse and creating the INBOUND DELIVERY as a result. i try to extend ConfirmedInboundDelivery but i am not sure if this is the right place : my goal is to create .xbo there check some validations like: 1.1. When a warehouse user posts a Purchase Order Goods Receipt (GR), Gauzy requires follow-up in cases where certain exceptions occur (per line): a. Over-Quantity Receipt – The total received quantity is greater than the ordered quantity on the PO line by more than 5%. b. Early Delivery – The receipt is posted before the delivery date that was defined on the PO line by more than month and year. then we have to check the Target logistic area id and do some validations .... the main request is that you try to answer me what is tje correct .xbo that i need to extend in order to check this trigger process i attached a screen shot of the window that i need to exctend

entry.title: create new tab with singlenotehistory reuse component on ACCOUNT TI Screen

in a clear and orderly manner
Or if they show me a real example including screenshots
That would be very helpful
Thanks in advance

entry.title: Remote debugging for a TypeScript deployed app on BTP?
entry.content:
Hi,

is it possible to remotely debug a in TypeScript developed app on BTP? cf ssh is enabled and I can connect the debugger with cf ssh -N -L 9229:127.0.0.1:9229 myapp

But since source is compiled into .js and .js.map the breakpoints set in .ts files have no effect so do breakpoints in the .js files of the gen folder.

Thanks

entry.title: Cloud Applications Studio VS 2022 Extension - Retargeting Project to .NET Framework 4
entry.content:
Hi, I switched to a new laptop on which I installed Visual Studio 2022 Professional and the new Cloud Applications Studio Extension (SCSSExtn_2505_1-70009081.VSIX). On my old machine everything works fine but on the new one I get following message which I can dismiss on Dev and Test but on Prod it doesn't work / keeps unloading the project:

It states that the project is targeting .NET Framework 4 which is not supported anymore and I should switch the target to .NET Framework 4.8. I tested both available options, but it simply unloads the project. (And 4.0 can't be installed due to a newer version already installed)

The only difference on the old machine is, that I have the pilot version also installed.

entry.title: REST APIs are working fine But my Service.js implmentations are not triggering when app is deployed
entry.content:
Hi guys i have a requirement when i have use react as an app in CAP project. Where i have done that and working fine in local development. But when i deploy using manifest.yml 

where i want only service to be as separate application so i have build data using CDS BUILD --PRODUCTION for deployment.

When deployement is done i wasnt able to call my action and function which are implemented in Service.js . 

i am repeating again everything is working fine in the local development. and i would deploy React app as static_buildpack as separate applicaiton and use this service of app there.

Is there anything i have missed?

Thanks & Regards

entry.title: "Access to path is denied", cannot open the solution in the new SAP Cloud Applications Studio
entry.content:
Hi,

Ever since installing Visual Studio 2022 and the new Cloud Application Studio extension (2508), whenever I try to open an existing solution, I keep getting the following error:

Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Error		Severe error while opening a solution: System.UnauthorizedAccessException: Access to the path 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Enterprise\Common7\IDE\CUSTOMERSYSTEM\Y......\' is denied.
   at System.IO.__Error.WinIOError(Int32 errorCode, String maybeFullPath)
   at System.IO.Directory.InternalCreateDirectory(String fullPath, String path, Object dirSecurityObj, Boolean checkHost)
   at System.IO.Directory.InternalCreateDirectoryHelper(String path, Boolean checkHost)
   at SAP.Copernicus.Core.Util.LocalFileHandler.CreateFileOnDisk(Byte[] fileContentBytes, String filePath, Boolean updateWriteableFile) in c:\j\701\w\b9umf2nsnw\gen\tmp\src\CopernicusUtilLib\Core\Util\LocalFileHandler.cs:line 101
   at SAP.CopernicusProjectView.XRepSynchronizer.XRepSynchronizer.SyncDisk(String XRepfolderPath, String parentFolderPathOnDisk, List`1& deletedFiles) in c:\j\701\w\b9umf2nsnw\gen\tmp\src\CopernicusProjectView\XRepSynchronizer\XRepSynchronizer.cs:line 581
   at SAP.CopernicusProjectView.XRepSynchronizer.XRepMapper.GetSolutionFromXRepository(String solutionName, String solutionVersion) in c:\j\701\w\b9umf2nsnw\gen\tmp\src\CopernicusProjectView\XRepSynchronizer\XRepMapper.cs:line 958
   at SAP.Copernicus.Core.RepositoryView.ContextMenu.ContextMenuHandler.OpenSolution(SolutionNode selectedSolutionNode) in c:\j\701\w\b9umf2nsnw\gen\tmp\src\Copernicus\Core\RepositoryView\ContextMenu\ContextMenuHandler.cs:line 282

I can open the customer's system without any issues, then I try to open the solution, that's when I get the above error.

To me it seems like it wants to try opening the solution at the wrong place. That folder is the installation folder, it should open up the folder it created under my user instead (C:\Users\User\source\repos). So far the only thing that fixes it is reinstalling the VSIX add-on, then I can open the solution but this is so annoying to do every single time. Is there a way to fix this issue? I tried searching but I couldn't find anything useful.

Thanks!

entry.title: Visual studio, sap cloud application extension, system connection configuration
entry.content:
Hello guys,

Does any one knows how to configure the system connection of the new VS extension ?

 
 

previously I had a powershell script that would update a windows' registry entry everytime there was an sdk update to avoid re-enter manually all our environments...

is there any workaround now? another key register or config file to maintain in the extension folder?

please help

regards
